verbose_text: The findings from the present study are supported by the findings from previous studies that have shown that expression of the NCOA1 gene downregulates the role of pro inflammatory factors, including NF-kappaB and AP-1, to exert its anti-inflammatory effects [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: NCOA1 gene downregulates the role of pro-inflammatory factors, including NF-kappaB and AP-1
